name: Freighter Dockyard
description: All the trade gantries, maintainance facilites and refueling shuttles required to maintain a fleet of starships frieghters.

name: Water Reserves
description: Large quantities of dihydrogen oxide, pressurised in order to maintain a subcritical state.

name: Ice Mine
description: Extraction of DHMO from surface ice deposits.

name: Reclaimation Facility
description: Sorting facilities to recover useful resources from industrial waste.

name: Chemical Fuel Plant
description: Facilities for converting H2O into chemical fuel.
